posts.message: Watch the video, Apple vs PC, Surface Pro 3 version (by Yahoo)

posts.description: Yes, here is Microsoft again, with a third version of its Surface Pro; The Surface concept is either brilliant or doomed: It’s a tablet and a laptop in one. When it’s a tablet, it’s something like an iPad. It can run the 4 million Windows programs — full-blown software like Photoshop, Quicken, iTune…

posts.message: I'm wondering actually, Do we have a/an website/initiative that is aiming at teaching open source libraries (code, structure, and architecture) to humble developers, so they may be able to contribute to it in the future ?

Good evening guys, I'm conducting a research about new Technology Start-ups in Egypt and Egyptian entrepreneurs so as a part of this research I need to interview volunteers Egyptian entrepreneurs who're running and marketing Technology Start-ups, I need from 30 to 60 minutes from your time. 

Please if you're interested in participating in this research contact me at once to schedule a meeting time and your help is very much appreciated.
